name: FIGIEFA - Fédération Internationale des Grossistes, Importateurs & Exportateurs en Fournitures Automobiles / International Federation of Automotive Distributors
goal:
FIGIEFA represents the interests of 20 European national trade associations of automotive aftermarket distributors from 19 European countries.

FIGIEFA monitors and studies EU policy developments affecting the automotive aftermarket industry value chain. Its aim is focused on the maintenance and promotion of free and effective competition in the market for vehicle replacement parts, servicing and repair.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Internal Market (vehicle and component type approval legislation, Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Information, eCall)
- Digital Single Market and Connectivity
- Roadworthiness Testing
- Competition Policy (competition law framework for the automotive aftermarket)
- Legal Protection of Industrial Designs
- CEN standardization work
- Transport Policy (White Paper)
- Environment policies (end-of life vehicles and eco-maintenance)
- CARS 2020 Working Groups (until 2014)
